org.asoem.greyfish.impl.environment

Interface SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<A extends Agent<?>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DiscreteEventScheduler, DiscreteTime, DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>, Environment<A>, Scheduler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Basic2DEnvironment, BasicEnvironment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Abstract2DEnvironment, AbstractEnvironment, DefaultBasic2DEnvironment, DefaultBasicEnvironment, Generic2DEnvironment

    public interface SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<A extends Agent<?>>
extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>, DiscreteEventScheduler
    A getSimulation which executes it's agents in discrete steps. Before each step all agents are synchronized, to ensure that they all share the same knowledge.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.asoem.greyfish.core.environment.Environment

      • Methods inherited from interface org.asoem.greyfish.core.scheduler.Scheduler
